Add messaging template Create new messaging template Use template Please select template Please select mail box Seems like you don\'t have any templates! you can create that in your profile section Type here‚Ä¶ Type here‚Ä¶ Template name: Enter template name Save Select plan type Current Plan Create new campaign Campaign Task Click to create \n campaign Campaign is a series of emails and or Text sent to a prospect using automation or creating a manual task on predetermined time delay. Automated Email Manual Email Automated emails are sent using automation and Manual emails create a task on your /n dashboard for you to approve it before sending.
Automated Text Manual Text Automated Text are sent using automation \n and Manual Text create a task on your \n dashboard for you to approve it before sending.

Create new broadcast Recurring email broadcast Recurring text broadcast ContactNinja allows you to schedule texts or emails with multiple \n occurrences. You can schedule these in daily, \n weekly, and monthly increments. Bzcard theme colour in order to see preview please press preview on top right corner Cutom Button Add onther custom button Title of your button Add your title Add url Add a short bio Bio Add description Add call to action Schedule a meeting Know more Visit now Inquire now Learn more *Add url Custom HTML Add media blocks to your BizCard ContactNinja supports adding of your YouTube videos. ContactNinja supports adding of your Images. ContactNinja supports adding of your downloadable pdf. What would you like to add?
